source:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_00This vexed villager is keeping watch of the ocean with a growing sense of dread.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
イサリ村の不安そうな漁師は、水平線を見つめている。

source:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_01A man of Isari has been waiting patiently for his daughter to return from Kugane, but can stand it no longer. Fearing the worst, he asks you to go and search for her along the shore of Sakazuki.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

不安そうな漁師から、イサリ村へ帰省するはずの娘の安否を確認してほしいと依頼された。紅玉海のサカズキ島付近で、イサリ村へ向かう「シホウミ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_02<tab>You find a young maiden along the shore in the company of a Blue Kojin with two Red Kojin fallen at their feet. Mistaking you for a threat, the Blue Kojin prepares to fight, but soon lowers his blade as you explain why you have come. The maiden before you is, in fact, Shihoumi, and she tells of the Blue Kojin's daring rescue. Though gravely injured, he soon runs off to retrieve Shihoumi's stolen cargo from the Red Kojin. She begs you to save him from this fool's errand before it is too late.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_02<tab>イサリ村へ向かう職人シホウミを見つけた。彼女は、村で配る荷を紅甲羅に奪われたという。シホウミを助けたコウジン族は、荷を取り返すため、紅甲羅を追っていった。彼に加勢するため、紅玉海の獄之蓋にて、「変わり兜のコウジン族」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_03<tab>The Blue Kojin is badly bruised and surrounded by his Red brothers, but you quickly put an end to their assault. With the Red Kojin defeated, you tend to the fallen Blue Kojin's wounds.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_03<tab>変わり兜のコウジン族と合流し、紅甲羅の襲撃者を討伐して、荷を取り戻すことができた。負傷しているらしい「変わり兜のコウジン族」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_04<tab>You and the Blue Kojin named Kabuto are soon joined by Shihoumi, who wishes to thank you both for your help. Kabuto, however, insists that he be the one to reward you, given that you saved his life. Nevertheless, the girl insists that he accept a gift─an item of his choosing from among her wares─and Kabuto relents, settling upon a doll crafted in the likeness of a Kojin. He then invites you to Tamamizu, where he might present to you a token of his gratitude.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_04<tab>碧甲羅のカブトを救助し、取り返した荷をシホウミに渡した。この礼として、カブトはコウジン族のカラクリ人形を手に入れた。カブトを助けた礼を受け取るため、紅玉海のベッコウ島にいる「カブト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_05<tab>You meet with Kabuto at Tamamizu and are taken to their newly created treasure vault. His plans to thank you are soon halted when the Kojin find themselves in the presence of a kami. The divine spirit, who prefers to be addressed as Tsukumo, declares Kabuto the leader of a group known as the Divine Circle, whose mission is to traverse the realm in search of treasures to fill their vault. Moreover, you have been named his first recruit. Never one to decline a call to action, you prepare yourself for adventures both wondrous and perilous.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SEQ_05<tab>カブトと話し、カラクリ人形が碧甲羅の宝物殿に奉納された。ところが、人形が動き出し、碧甲羅たちは「付喪神(つくもがみ)が顕れた」と大騒ぎ。「ツクモ」と名乗る人形は、「碧の宝探衆」を結成して、冒険者を強引に加入させ、カブトを頭に指名した。カブトやツクモとともに、碧甲羅の宝物殿を満たすため、碧甲羅の手伝いをしていこう！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_00<tab>Search for Shihoumi.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_00<tab>シホウミを探す

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_01<tab>Find the overconfident Kojin.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_01<tab>変わり兜のコウジン族と合流

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_02<tab>Aid the overconfident Kojin.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_02<tab>変わり兜のコウジン族を救助

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Kabuto.

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_000<tab>Where's that blasted boat? It should've been here by now...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_000……うーん、見当たらんのう……。
そろそろ到着してもいい頃合いなのだが……。
やはり、何かあったんだろうか……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_001<tab>Oh! Sorry, didn't see you there. My daughter is late returning from Kugane, you see, and I thought to come and look for her.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_001おおっと失礼、気付きませなんだ。
実は、クガネで職人になった娘が里帰りしてくるはずなのですが、
いっこうに現れず……こうして水平線を探していたのです。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_002<tab>I can't imagine the Confederacy giving her any trouble; she's always been good about putting money aside for the Ruby Tithe... Oh gods! What if the Red Kojin caught sight of her?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_002常であれば、サカズキ島で帆別銭を払った後、
浜に沿うように、舟で渡ってくるはずなのですが……。
最近、あのあたりは紅甲羅どもが暴れていて、危険も多いとか。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_003<tab>My dear, sweet Shihoumi. She only meant to bring home a bit of old furnishings to give comfort to our village. I don't know what I'd do if anything should happen to her.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_003里帰りのたびに、クガネで安価な古道具を買い集め、
貧しい村の者たちに配って回る、よくできた娘です……。
もしものことがあったら、わしは……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_004<tab>I know this is sudden, but...you've the look of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who can handle a bit of danger. Would you be willing to look for my daughter? She should be traveling close to the shore of Sakazuki.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_004あなたの立ち居振る舞い、相当な手練れとお見受けします。
サカズキ島あたりで、職人風の娘を探してみてもらえませぬか？
娘の名は、「シホウミ」と申します……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_009<tab>Oh, Shihoumi... I pray you are safe.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_FATHER02973_000_009<tab>ああ、娘「シホウミ」が無事だといいのですが……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_009<tab>Stay back, or taste my steel!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_009何奴……！？
寄らば斬る……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_010<tab>Ahhh! Please, stay away!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_010<tab>ぎゃ～、お助けを～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_011<tab>Not another step.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_011何奴……！？
寄らば斬る……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_A1_000_001<tab>I was sent here by a fisherman from Isari.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_A1_000_001<tab>イサリ村の漁師に頼まれてきた

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_A1_000_002<tab>I've come from Isari in search of Shihoumi.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_A1_000_002<tab>シホウミを捜しにきた！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_012<tab>A fisherman from Isari? By any chance did he send you in search of his daughter? If so, I suppose it is me you are searching for. My name is Shihoumi.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_012なんと、とっつぁんに頼まれて来てくださったんですか！？
私が、娘のシホウミです。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_013<tab>From Isari, you say? Was it my father who sent you for me?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_013ええ、私がシホウミです。
もしや、とっつぁんに頼まれて捜しにきてくださったんですか？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_014<tab>My ship was attacked by the Red Kojin, but I was saved by this warrior of the Blue. Would that we could have saved the cargo on board.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_014イサリ村に向かっていたところ、紅甲羅に襲われたのです。
こちらのお方が助けてくださり、命拾いしましたが、
村で配るつもりの荷は、まるっと奪われてしまいました……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_015<tab>Save the cargo? Very well.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_015<tab>ここで、待てぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_016<tab>Wait! Your kindness is greatly appreciated, but you cannot mean to go against the Red Kojin. Not alone.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_016お、お待ちください！
まさか、紅甲羅たちを追いかけて、荷を取り戻そうと？
ありがたい話ですが、ひとりで向かうなんて無茶です！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_017<tab>Please, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, you have to go after him!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_017ああ、行ってしまわれた……。
あの方、先ほど私をかばって負傷されているのです！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_018<tab>He was gravely injured in my rescue. 'Twould be suicide for him to face them in his condition!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_018私を襲った紅甲羅は数も多く、
手負いの彼ひとりでは、返り討ちにされかねません！
どうか、あの方に助太刀してくださいまし！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_019<tab>We barely escaped the Red Kojin with our lives. He has no chance against them with those injuries.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_019私を襲った紅甲羅は数も多く、
手負いの彼ひとりでは、返り討ちにされかねません！
どうか、あの方に助太刀してくださいまし！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_POPMESSAGE_000_026<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_POPMESSAGE_000_026<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_027<tab>Land-dwelling scum!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_027<tab>こしゃくなァー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_028<tab>These treasures belong to the Red!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_028<tab>渡すものかァー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_029<tab>Stay out of our way!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BALLOON_000_029<tab>邪魔立てするなァー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_030<tab>How could I fall for such an obvious trap...
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_030<tab>面目ない……伏兵に気付かず、この失態……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_031<tab>Thank you, brave warrior.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_031<tab>それにしても、貴殿は強い……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SON02973_000_032<tab>Oh, thank goodness you're both all right!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SON02973_000_032<tab>ふたりとも、ご無事でしたか！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_033<tab>Why have you come, woman!?
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_033<tab>女、なぜ来たぁ……！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_034<tab>I...I'm sorry. You both were gone for so long I began to worry, and...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_034す、すみません！
おふたりのことが心配で、つい……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_035<tab>Do not misunderstand. I am not angry. I meant only to say this place is dangerous.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_035……詫びなど不要……。
怒ってはおらぬ、ここは危険ゆえ、つい……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_036<tab>But the Red are gone now, and your cargo is safe. Everything is there, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_036とにかく、荷は取り戻したぁ……。
受け取るがいい……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_037<tab>One...two... Yes, yes, this seems to be all of it.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_037<tab>まあ、すべて戻ってくるとは……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_100_037<tab>The others will be so happy when they see these goods. Thank you so much!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_100_037よかった……イサリ村の皆も喜びます！
本当に、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_038<tab>Then my work here is finished.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_038<tab>では、拙者はこれにてぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_039<tab>Wait, please. Would you at least tell me the name of the gallant Kojin who rescued me?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_039ど、どうかお待ちを！
助けていただいたお礼もできていません！
せめて、お名前をお聞かせください！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_040<tab>My name...?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_040名……？
そうか、名乗っていなかったぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_041<tab>(-Kabuto-)I am Kabuto of the Blue.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_041(-カブト-)拙者は、カブト……。
碧のタマミズに棲まう、碧甲羅のひとり……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_042<tab>(-Kabuto-)You, brave warrior. What is the name of the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who rescued me?
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_042<tab>(-カブト-)ところで、貴殿の名はぁ……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_043<tab>(-Kabuto-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... I shall remember it.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_043(-カブト-))) (( )) 02 /var>殿……
しかと、銘記したぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_044<tab>I haven't much, but please, let me repay you both for your kindness.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_044カブト様に)) (( )) 02 /var>様、
ささやかですが、どうか礼をさせてください！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_045<tab>(-Kabuto-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> saved my life. For another to repay my debt of gratitude would be a stain on my honor.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_045(-カブト-)待たれよぉ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に救われたのは拙者……。
礼ならば、拙者からするのが筋……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_046<tab>I...I see... Then at the very least, let me give you something. Most of these goods are worn or broken, but if anything here is to your liking, by all means.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_046そ、そんな……では、せめてカブト様だけでも！
取り返していただいた荷から、お好きなものをどうぞ！
どれも、使い古しの品ばかりですが……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_047<tab>(-Kabuto-)Broken?
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_047<tab>(-カブト-)使い古しの品……！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_048<tab>Repairing them is part of my training as a craftsman. Thankfully the merchants of Kugane are willing to part with such wares for relatively little. Still, I hope there is something here that pleases you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_048ええ、修行中の私が買えるのは、安価な古道具くらいのもの。
それでも、修理してあげれば、村の皆は喜んでくれます。
お眼鏡に適う物があるといいのですが……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_049<tab>(-Kabuto-)What is this?
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_049<tab>(-カブト-)こ、これは如何なる品なりぃ……！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_050<tab>Ah, that is a karakuri puppet. Would that I knew who made it or how. Fixing it was quite the challenge. Still, the children back home will love─
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_050ああ、カラクリ人形ですね。
作者不明の古い品で、壊れていましたが私が手直しました。
村の子どもたちが、喜ぶかと思いまして……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_051<tab>(-Kabuto-)I would have this karakuri.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_051<tab>(-カブト-)では、この人形を所望する……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_052<tab>Oh. That is a...fine choice. Yes, a fine choice indeed. Far be it from me to deny the Kojin who saved me his reward.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_052確かに、コウジン族を模した人形ですしね！
もちろん、喜んでいただけるなら、ぜひ、どうぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_053<tab>(-Kabuto-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Meet with me at the entrance to Tamamizu. There, I will present you with a token of my thanks.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_053(-カブト-))) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
次は、拙者が礼をする番……。
碧のタマミズの入口にて待つ……ではぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_054<tab>A peculiar one, isn't he? Certainly not the best with words, but his heart is pure and sword true.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_054ちょっとばかり、ぶっきらぼうで口下手ですが、
カブト様、心根も武の腕も素晴らしい方でした……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_055<tab>Thank you again for your help. Delivering these home should be easy enough on my own. Take care, and safe travels.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_055)) (( )) 02 /var>様も、ありがとうございました。
碧のタマミズまで、どうか、お気をつけて。
私は、この荷物をまとめたら、イサリ村に向かいます。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_059<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIHOUMI_000_059<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_060<tab>You have come. Good.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_060<tab>……来たかぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_059<tab>There you are! You disobeyed me to go and search for treasures again, didn't you?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_059(-聞き覚えのある声-)こら、カブトよ！
またもや、指示に背き、ひとりでお宝探しに行ったなぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_061<tab>What's this? Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A welcome surprise. I hope Kabuto has not given you too much trouble.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_061おや、これは、お客人。
また、お会いしましたなぁ～。
もしや、カブトが世話になったのですか？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_062<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> saved my life, and so I wished to present <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> a token of my gratitude. I did not realize you were acquainted. Perhaps I should take my leave...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_062窮地に助太刀いただいたゆえ、礼のためお招きしたぁ……。
長老と知り合いだったとはぁ……。
ならば、拙者は……後に……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_063<tab>Wait, Kabuto! Where are you going? What of your gift to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_063待て、カブト！
礼をするために、わざわざタマミズにお呼びしたというのに、
お前が先に引っ込んでどうするかぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_064<tab>So you did not come to speak with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_064)) (( )) 02 /var>殿と長老で、
積もる話もあろうかとぉ…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_065<tab>I was not even aware <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> was here!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_065ならば、そう言わねば、伝わるものかぁ～！
お前は口下手で、いつも言葉が足りんぞぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_066<tab>I came here searching for you. How many times must I tell you not to go searching for treasure on your own? The Red are running amok in the Ruby Sea, you know this.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_066その上、紅甲羅が暴れているというに、
ワシの指示を無視して、ひとりお宝探しに出かけるとはぁ～！
不届き千万、反省せんかぁ～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_067<tab>Yes, I went alone, and yes, I was saved by <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I believe it was fate. It brought us together and rewarded me with a karakuri puppet.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_067拙者は、ひとりでも……。
現に)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に助けられたとはいえ、
縁を結び、お宝の人形を得たり…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_068<tab>I will not deny you are a gifted fighter, but it would be foolish to mistake today's happenstance for good fortune. Though I suppose you have done worse in more favorable situations.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_068うむ、武の才はあれど、縁を結ぶ才はからきし……
そんなお前にしては、ようやったなぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_069<tab>Before we continue, I wish to add today's find to the treasure vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_069)) (( )) 02 /var>殿には、礼をしたい……。
だが、まずは宝物殿にお宝を納めるのが先……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_070<tab>You seem puzzled, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ah! You must think he means to travel to the Isle of Zekki. Allow me to explain.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_070)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、驚かれましたかな？
以前、宝物殿は、紅甲羅が守るゼッキ島にあると、
お伝えしましたから、驚くのも当然でしょうなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_071<tab>As you are well aware, the Isle of Zekki has been home to the most prized relics of both the Red and the Blue since time immemorial.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_071古来より、甲羅の色にかかわらず、集めた宝物は、
等しくゼッキ島の宝物殿に納め、神が降るのを待つのが慣わし……
ところが、紅甲羅たちが、その門戸を閉ざしたのです～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_072<tab>Though the Red guard it fiercely, they can no longer subsist on the plunder of the imperials. Now they demand that we join in their work as mercenaries and raiders. Naturally we refused, and so they deny us entry to the vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_072帝国の後ろ盾を失った紅甲羅が、焦りでもしたのか、
碧甲羅に対して、配下の兵となるよう要求してきましてなぁ～。
これを断るや、宝物殿への立ち入りを禁じてきたのです！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_073<tab>Rather than take up arms against our brothers, we have taken it upon ourselves to create a new treasure vault, here in Tamamizu.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_073やむなく我らは、ここ碧のタマミズに独自の宝物殿を造り、
宝物を集めて奉納することに決めたのですぞぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_074<tab>To that end we have devoted a great deal of effort to searching far and wide for treasures with which to fill our vault. If certain individuals would learn not to wander off on their own, I could take comfort in knowing said efforts are not wasted.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_074ゆえに目下のところ、宝物殿を満たすべく、
一族総出で力を合わせ、宝物を探さねばならぬというに……
カブトときたら、身勝手な単独行動を繰り返すばかり！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_075<tab>The others would only slow me down...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_075弱き仲間は、足手まとい……。
お宝探しなら、拙者ひとりでもぉ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_076<tab>You will have to forgive Kabuto─he is as stubborn as his shell is thick. But you are not here to listen to our quarrels. Come, let us make our way to the treasure vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_076やれやれ、説得は、長期戦になりそうですなぁ～。
これ以上、お客人を、お待たせするわけにもいきませぬ～。
まずは、我らの宝物殿へと案内しましょうぞぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_MAKURA_000_080<tab>Kabuto, you've returned! What wondrous treasure have you brought us today?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_MAKURA_000_080カブト、すごいお宝を手に入れたんでしょ～？
うちら、みんなで見にきたのよぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIKITAHE_000_081<tab>You can't possibly expect to fill the vault on your own. Such a task is much too great, even for you. Let us help, brother.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SHIKITAHE_000_081ひとりで宝物殿をいっぱいにするつもりなんだろぉ～？
さすがのカブトでも、難しいと思うよぉ～？
縁を重んじる碧甲羅なんだからさ、助け合おうよぉ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_082<tab>No. I work alone.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_082手助け無用……。
見るが良い……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_083<tab>Oh my! You never mentioned the puppet was a Kojin. Such detail, such craftsmanship. The kami will surely be pleased with a treasure so fine.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_083ほほう、コウジン族の人形となぁ～？
長き刻を経て、得も言われぬ風格を漂わせておるのぉ～。
さぞや立派な付喪神(つくもがみ)様を、お迎えできそうじゃぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_084<tab>(-???-)Kabuto of the Blue!
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_084<tab>(-甲高い声-)ごうぅらぁ～カブトぉ～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_085<tab>Wh-What!? Makura, was that you?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_085な、なんじゃ、この甲高い声はぁ～！？
マクラの声……ではないよなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_086<tab>(-???-)No one walks alone, Kabuto. To turn your back on your brothers and sisters would be folly of the greatest order.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_086(-甲高い声のカラクリ人形-)なぁ～にが「手助け無用」じゃ！
カブトごときが、ひとりで宝物殿を満たすなど、
無理に決まっておろうがぁ～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_087<tab>A tsukumogami!? Oh great, divine spirit, we are humbled by your presence.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_BUNCHIN_000_087つ……つ……付喪神様が顕現されたぞぉ～！！
皆の者、こうべを垂れ、控えよぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_088<tab>(-???-)Raise your heads and be proud! You have done well to gather such a glorious bounty.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_088(-付喪神？-)皆の者、おもてをあげよ！
宝物殿を満たしたいという思い、よくよく受け取った！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_089<tab>(-???-)But the task before you is too great for a single Kojin. Kabuto, you must lead your brothers and sisters. Lead them to ever greater treasures and prosperity!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_089(-付喪神？-)じゃが、いかに武の達人と言えど、
ひとりの力では、到底かなわぬものと心得よ！
カブトよ、多くの者と縁を結び、お宝探しを率いるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_MAKURA_000_090<tab>You have been chosen, brother!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_MAKURA_000_090すごいじゃない、カブト！
付喪神様から、直々に指名されちゃうなんてぇ～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_091<tab>I am honored. Truly, I am. I swear on my honor our vault will overflow with riches, but I need no help to─
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_091つ、付喪神様……
お宝探しの任、謹んでお受けいたします……。
しかし、助力など不要……やはり、拙者ひとりでぇ…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_092<tab>(-???-)Silence! You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> form a company of treasure seekers, starting with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_092(-付喪神？-)ならん、ならんぞぉ～！！
まずは、そちらのお客人！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_093<tab>(-???-)Yes, you─<var 09 E948 ((the fleshy one)) ((with the long neck)) ((with the short legs)) ((with the fuzzy tail)) ((with the muscular arms)) ((with the horns)) ((with the muscular arms)) ((with the funny ears)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_093<tab>(-付喪神？-)そなたは、カブト率いる宝探衆の一員じゃ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_094<tab>Please, divine one. There is no need to burden <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with─
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_094し……しかし……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿にも、
都合というものがぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_095<tab>(-???-)Such insolence! You call yourself a warrior, but your prowess pales before the might of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_095(-付喪神？-)この、うつけ者め～！！
こちらの武人は、そなたよりも腕が立つ！
縁を結び、ともにお宝を探すことで、大いに学びを得るがいい！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_096<tab>(-???-)Was it not <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who said it was fate that brought you together?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_096(-付喪神？-)そもそも、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿と、
縁を結びたいと願ったのは、お主自身のはずじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_097<tab>Yes, but...how do you─
target: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_097<tab>ぐっ……な、なぜそれを……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_098<tab>(-???-)You must accept that to which fate has bound you, Kabuto, and do so with all your heart.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_098(-付喪神？-)お宝探しとは、縁結びに似たり！
だが、本心を隠し偽っては、縁など永遠に結べぬ！
縁とは、心と心を結ぶものじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_099<tab>(-???-)Henceforth, you and yours will be known as the Divine Circle. Who else shall join you in this endeavor?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_099(-付喪神？-)これにて、「碧の宝探衆」の結成じゃ！
さあ、カブトよ、わしが名指しした者たちに、
仲間を率いる頭として、挨拶せよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_100<tab>Well, there is Zukin, Makura, and Shikitahe. I mean, that is... If it isn't an inconvenience...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_KABUTO_000_100付喪神様のお言葉ゆえ、やむを得ぬ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
そしてズキン、マクラ、シキタヘ、すまんが、頼む……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_101<tab>(-???-)Where is your backbone, Kabuto? The duty placed upon you is both sudden and daunting, so your uncertainty shall be forgiven─but only this once.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_101(-付喪神？-)声が小さい、言葉が足りん……！
だが、初回ゆえ、これにて許してやろう。
今後、お目付け役として、わしもカブトに同行するぞよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_102<tab>Furthermore, until you prove your resolve to be unbending and your mind focused, I, Tsukumo, will oversee your operations personally!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_102(-付喪神？-)これより、わしも宝探衆の一員じゃ。
ゆえに、過度なへりくだりなど無用とゆこうぞ。
そうじゃのう……「ツクモ」と呼ぶがいい！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_103<tab>And with that, our team is assembled. Let us set forth and seek out the untold riches of the realm that even the Red Kojin will burn with envy!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_TSUKUMO_000_103われら、カブト率いる「碧の宝探衆」！
みな一丸となって協力し、多くの縁を結びて、
宝物殿をお宝で満たすぞよ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>The Blue Kojin have begun making contributions to the treasure vault in Tamamizu.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_200碧のタマミズに宝物殿が建立されました。
碧甲羅が、お宝を奉納したため、
宝物殿に、ちょっぴりお宝が増えました！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Friendly<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Kojin.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_201「コウジン族：碧甲羅」との友好関係が、
冒険者のこれまでの活躍により、ランク3の「友好」になり、
コウジン族の「蛮族クエスト」が開放されました。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Kojin beast tribe quests are now available from Zukin at Tamamizu.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_202これ以降、碧のタマミズにいる「ズキン」より、
繰り返し可能な「蛮族デイリークエスト」を、
受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Furthermore, you may now purchase wares from Shikitahe.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_203また、「シキタヘ」より、
蛮族の取り扱う商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！

source: TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>In order to undertake the next beast tribe main quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “A Silence in Three Parts.”
target:
TEXT_BANKJN001_02973_SYSTEM_000_204次の「蛮族ストーリークエスト」を進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：紅蓮のリベレーター」の、
「静かなるヤンサ」を完了する必要があります。
